name: Zombie Armageddon Do Not Lose Hope
name_original: Zombie Armageddon Do Not Lose Hope
description:
This is insane Game with slowmotion skill press F to  slowmotion 

In this thrilling horror shooter game, your survival skills will be put to the test in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. As a lone survivor, you must scavenge for resources and weapons to defend yourself against the undead hordes that lurk around every corner. With guns, explosives, and melee weapons at your disposal, you must use your skills and quick reflexes to take down zombies and other monstrous creatures roaming the wasteland. But be warned: zombies aren't your only foe. Other survivors may be equally dangerous, and they will go to any length to steal your resources and eliminate you from the game. You will discover clues and secrets as you explore the desolate landscape.
